0.1.name: wordpress/wis-logger
0.1.description:
WIS-Logger let developers to use the "do_action" function to debug theirs plugin.

Features

  • Let developers log information/debug/warnings/Errors/Fatal
  • No need to remove logging after release, if wis-logger is not installed nothing happends
  • Ability to fetch all kind of PHP errors and log them in the same way
  • You can shose which debug level you want to log.

Support

Having problems or need support? Use the feedback button on http://warting.se
